devdoc.details: The contract assumes Signer has verified an In-App Purchase Receipt

params._newOwner: The new owner of the contract

params._newSigner: The new Signer of the contract

changeStarterPack((uint256,address[],uin.details: The Owner can change the default starterpack contents

params._signer: allows the contract deployer(owner) to define the signer on construction

distributePack(address,address).details: Can only be called by signer, assumes signer has validated an IAP receipt, owner can block calling by pausing.

params._attribution: A payable address who referred the starterpack purchaser
params._recipient: A payable address that is sent a starterpack after being checked for eligibility

eligible(address).details: will return false if a transaction of distributePack for _recipient has been successfully executed      RETURNING TRUE BECAUSE ELIGIBILITY WILL BE HANDLED BY THE BACKEND

params._recipient: The address to be checked for eligibility

returns.ethAmount: uint256 ETH amount in wei that will be sent to a recipient
returns.stickerPackIds: uint[] List of sticker packs to send to a recipient
returns.tokenAmounts: uint[] Amount of tokens that will be sent to a recipient
returns.tokens: address[] List of tokens that will be sent to a recipient

returns.available: uint number of promo packs available
returns.ethAmount: uint256 ETH amount in wei that will be sent to a recipient
returns.stickerPackIds: uint[] List of sticker packs to send to a recipient
returns.tokenAmounts: uint[] Amount of tokens that will be sent to a recipient
returns.tokens: address[] List of tokens that will be sent to a recipient

params._account: The address to obtain the attribution config
params._isPromo: Indicates if the configuration for a promo should be returned or not

returns.maxThreshold: If isPromo == true: Number of promo bonuses still available for that address else: Max number of attributions to pay before requiring approval
returns.tokenLen: Number of tokens configured as part of the reward

params._account: The address to obtain the attribution's token config
params._idx: Index of token array in the attribution used to obtain the token config
params._isPromo: Indicates if the configuration for a promo should be returned or not

returns.tokenAmount: Amount of token configured in the attribution

params._assignedTo: Array of addresses with an attribution configured
params._isPromo: Indicates if the configuration to delete is the promo or default

setPause(bool).details: setPause must be called before Signer can call distributePack()

params._assignedTo: Use a valid address here to set custom settings. To set the default payout and threshold, use address(0);
params._isPromo: indicates if this attribution config is a promo or default config
params._thresholds: Max number of referrals allowed beforee requiring approval

devdoc.title: Starterpack Distributor

changeOwner(address).notice: Changes the owner of the contract

changeSigner(address).notice: Changes the Signer of the contract

distributePack(address,address).notice: Distributes a starterpack to an eligible address. Either a promo pack or a default will be distributed depending on availability

eligible(address).notice: Check if an address is eligible for a starterpack

getReferralRewardTokens(address,bool,uin.notice: Get token rewards for specific address

setPause(bool).notice: Allows the Owner to allow or prohibit Signer from calling distributePack().

setPayoutAndThreshold(bool,uint256,addre.notice: Set default/custom payout and threshold for referrals

withdraw(address[]).notice: Safety function allowing the owner to immediately pause starterpack distribution and withdraw all balances in the the contract

userdoc.notice: Attempts to deliver 1 and only 1 starterpack containing ETH, ERC20 Tokens and NFT Stickerpacks to an eligible recipient
